name: StupidMan
description:
★★★★★★★AAAAAAAHHHHH★★★★★★★

- Arrow keys or WASD to move and jump or swim

- Space to charge and fire your blaster and select idiot

★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★

Ohno! Evil man is gonna to bad things with his new 8 robot,s the dark idiots! Luckily, we have a secret weapon... STUPIDMAN!!!

Fight in epic battles against the 9 dark idiots so evil man won't take over the world

dark idiots from Easiest to Hardest:

- Wood Man

- Mike

- ARSON

- Bub

- Flashy

- Bomber

- Blow Boi

- Sanic

-ProjectYellow

★★★★★★★★★CREDITS★★★★★★★★★

-All sprites and all sound effects belong to Capcom, the original creator of Mega Man

- Music is from Mega Man II and Eschatos

- Intro music is Take on Me by a-ha
